function EP_BAD_03()

  -- なぜなのボク姫
  SaveData.Title = "なぜなのボク姫"

SAVE()

  -- //EP2の姫選挙に失敗時、オウガルートへ移行後に発生。

LAYER_CLEAR_ALL()

LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)

-- //SE：開始音（ﾃﾚﾃﾃﾚﾃﾃｰ!!）
PLAY_SE("SEz006.wav")
-- //BG：なぜなのボク姫（開始）

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano01.wav")
  MSG([[
【????】
 "Three!"
「さん！」]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano02.wav")
  MSG([[
【????】
 "Two!"
「にー！」]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano03.wav")
  MSG([[
【????】
 "One!"
「いち！」]])

  PLAY_BGM("BGM07.wav",0,true)
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG028aa")
  LAYER_SCALE(LAYER_BG,500,500)
  LAYER_MOVE_SCALE(LAYER_BG,100,100,500,Ease.OutSine)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

  EFFECT_SCREEN(1,30,30,500,false,false)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano04.wav")
  MSG([[
【????】
 "Kaboom!"
「どっかーん！」]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano05.wav")
  MSG([[
【????】
 "Wheeeeee!"
「わーーーーーーい！」]])

  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG028ba")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask023",1000,false)

  -- //BG：なぜなのボク姫背景
  -- //BU：ミナト（笑顔）、アキラ・メヒＴ（通常）
  --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01ea")
  --LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  --LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04aa")
  --LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)
  --PLAY_BGM("BGM07.wav",1000,true)

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01ea")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
  LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-400,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04aa")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
  LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,400,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano06.wav")
  MSG([[
【Minato・Akira】
 "Why, Bokuhime?!"
「なぜなのボク姫～！」]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano07.wav")
  MSG([[
【Minato】
 "Everyone, please gather around!"
「皆さーん、集まってくださーい！」]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano08.wav")
  MSG([[
【Minato】
 "No worries even if you reach a bad end! It's time for 'Why, Bokuhime?' where we explain why you got the ending you did!"
「バッドエンドを迎えても安心！
  　どうして今のエンディングを迎えたのか解説する、なぜなのボク姫の時間ですよー！」]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano09.wav")
  MSG([[
【Akira】
 "Gather around..."
「集まれー…」]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01ga")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano47.wav")
  MSG([[
【Minato】
 "Y-you’re low energy again... What’s up this time?"
「ま、またテンション低い……今度はどうしたの？」]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04da")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano48.wav")
  MSG([[
【Akira】
 "I’m wondering if this segment is really necessary after mistakes in the Princess Election. Honestly, isn’t trial and error the only way to solve things?"
「姫選挙でのミスに、このコーナー必要なのかなって。 ぶっちゃけ、トライ＆エラーを繰り返す以外に解決方法とかなくないです？」]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01da")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano49.wav")
  MSG([[
【Minato】
 "T-that’s not something you should say! Honestly, I came here not knowing what to say either, but since I showed up, I have to do my best!"
「そ、それは言っちゃダメだよ！　ボクも正直、何を話せばいいかわからずにここへ来たけど、来た以上はがんばらなきゃ！」]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01fa")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano50.wav")
  MSG([[
【Minato】
 "L-let’s at least share some tips for choosing the right options. There must be people still unfamiliar with the controls."
「ほ、ほら、正しい選択肢を選ぶコツとか伝えようよ。まだ操作に不慣れなヒトもいるだろうし」]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04ka")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano51.wav")
  MSG([[
【Akira】
 "Yeah, yeah. Well, since I barely get screen time in the school part, this is my precious chance to explain properly."
「はいはい。まぁ学園パートではほとんど出番のない私の貴重な出番ですからね、きちんと解説はしますよ」]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04aa")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano52.wav")
  MSG([[
【Akira】
 "First, calm down. When lots of choices pop up all at once, it’s easy to panic, but let’s read through them carefully one by one."
「まずは落ち着くことですね。一気に選択肢が出てくると焦りがちですが、冷静にひとつひとつ読んでいきましょう」]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04ea")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano53.wav")
  MSG([[
【Akira】
 "Even if you miss your desired choice, you can just wait to go through another round."
「お目当ての選択肢を選び損ねても、また一周するのを待てばいいだけですからね」]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01ea")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano54.wav")
  MSG([[
【Minato】
 "I see, it’s like waiting for the sushi you missed on a conveyor belt to come around again. I actually enjoy that moment—it’s exciting."
「なるほど、回転寿司で取り損ねたお寿司が戻ってくるのを待つ時みたいだね。ボク、あの時間もワクワクして嫌いじゃないよ」]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04da")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano55.wav")
  MSG([[
【Akira】
 "Eh... I usually only order with machines at conveyor belt sushi places though."
「えっ……私、回転寿司だと機械以外では注文しないんですけど」]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01ca")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano56.wav")
  MSG([[
【Minato】
 "Eh..."
「えっ…」]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04aa")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano57.wav")
  MSG([[
【Akira】
 "Eh..."
「えっ…」]])

  -- //短いセリフひとつ分の気まずい間
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
  WAIT(1000)

  -- //BG：なぜなのボク姫（おわり）
  STOP_BGM(1000)
  LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)
  WAIT_INPUT(1000)

  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG028ca")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)
  WAIT_INPUT(1000)


  -- //第２章［結-3］冒頭から再開

  -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
WAIT_INPUT(1000)

SystemSaveData.IsClearEP_BAD_03 = true;
ScenarioManager.Next(SaveData.BadNextScenario)
SaveData.BadNextScenario = ""

end
